value:
Azura is such a gentle child. But her
insight into others' hearts makes her
oversensitive, and she harbors ill will.

Ryoma, Hinoka, Corrin, Azura,
Takumi, and Sakura... Oh, my
children.

Even if we aren't bound by blood...
we are still a family. I love all of them
so much.

While I am with you, please...think of
me as your mother. If that's all right
with you, $Nu.

So many dream of a world without
war. I hope you can realize that
dream. I believe in you.

I don't mean to intrude. I am here
to check up on you. I was asked to
by $Nf.

Never give up and your dreams will
come true. I want all of my children
to understand that.
I am grateful.

How unfortunate. We all stumble
sometimes.

No matter how old you get, you will
always respond to kindness.

I am Mikoto, queen of Hoshido.
I hastened to follow a familiar voice
and found myself in this realm.

Am I dreaming? Or is my existence
itself a dream?$k$pI have the sense that I fell before I
was able to accomplish everything
I had hoped...$k$pBut here, I am able to see how all of
my children have grown.$k$pIt was your power that brought me
here, $Nu.
You and young Azura's voice.$k$pEven if I cannot stay...I am grateful
to the both of you. You have shown
me the continuation of my dream.$k$pFor my part, I can help by tending to
you and to Azura.$k$pI can only hope that if I nurture you,
you can both move forward.$k$pAnd as long as this dream continues...
I will be right here beside you.
せやっ
参ります
きゃああっ！
だめ…
Sweet dreams.
Dreams offer peace.
Forget your troubles.
Close your eyes, now.
Will I...dream?
うふふ…
It's all right now.
Be at ease.
I am Mikoto... However, I'm a bit different from the Mikoto you've heard about.
Trouble sleeping? Perhaps you'd like me to sing you a lullaby.
I am their mother... And it's a mother's duty to protect her children.
Watching your children grow up and find their independence can fill you with joy... But also with loneliness.
Being by your side offers a great deal of refuge. Not only for myself, but for the children as well.
Good morning.
Gently, now.
Pleasant dreams?
